<center><h2>Directory Structure</h2></center>

<h3>/figures</h3> .pdf figures exported from `scripts/`

<h3>/functions</h3> Intermediate functions used in scaling and graphing

  * **`graphing_functions.R`**: functions used in `scripts/`
  
<h3>/output</h3> .csv files of N-fixation rates and statistical results

  * **`annual_medians`**: description
  * **`seasonal_medians`**: description

<h3>/raw</h3> Input files used by the scripts

  * **`ch4_full_dataset.csv`**: description
  * **`ch4_soilsalinity_dataset.csv`**: description
  * **`GHGPlantMeta_metadata.xlsx`**: description
  * **`SMD_data`**: description
  
<h3>/scripts</h3> R scripts that convert units, perform global scaling, and produce figures

  * **`1_RF_CH4_TabS2.R`**: Random Forest Models for Table S2 and Figure 2
  * **`2_GAM_CH4_Tab3.R`**: Generalized additive model for soil salinity data (GAM), Tab S3 and Fig 2
  * **`3_Figure1_TabS1.R`**: description
